languages.text: Диверсанты убивали одного офицера за другим, сея панику и беспорядок. Тела их насаживали на колья, чтобы еретики издалека видели трупы своих военачальников. Как только разлад достиг пика, Космические волки подорвали турели, распахнули ворота и дали сигнал к атаке. Док был взят.

traits.locale_text: Лазутчики Космических волков хорошо знали свое дело. Они стравливали между собой отряды еретиков, скармливая им ложную информацию о товарищах, готовых сдаться лоялистам, и предательских нападениях одних союзных отрядов на другие. Как только разлад достиг своего пика, космодесантники подорвали турели, распахнули ворота и дали сигнал к атаке. Док был взят.

languages.text: The infiltrators killed one officer after another, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their commanders from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.
languages.original_text: Диверсанты убивали одного офицера за другим, сея панику и беспорядок. Тела их насаживали на колья, чтобы еретики издалека видели трупы своих военачальников. Как только разлад достиг пика, Космические волки подорвали турели, распахнули ворота и дали сигнал к атаке. Док был взят.

traits.locale_text: The infiltrators killed many an officer, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their generals from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

The infiltrators killed many an officer, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their generals from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

The infiltrators killed one officer after another, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their commanders from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

The infiltrators killed one officer after another, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their commanders from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

The infiltrators killed one officer after another, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their commanders from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

languages.text: 渗透者杀死了一名又一名军官，在敌人之中散播恐慌和混乱。那些军官的尸体被串在了刺桩上，这样一来，异端分子从很远的距离就能看到，他们的指挥官已经一命呜呼了。当敌人彻底陷入混乱之后，太空野狼摧毁了炮台，打开了大门，发出了进攻的信号。我们成功夺取了码头。
languages.original_text: The infiltrators killed one officer after another, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their commanders from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

traits.locale_text: 渗透者杀死了一名又一名军官，在敌人之中散播恐慌和混乱。那些军官的尸体被串在了刺桩上，这样一来，异端分子从很远的距离就能看到，他们的指挥官已经一命呜呼了。当敌人彻底陷入混乱之后，太空野狼摧毁了炮台，打开了大门，发出了进攻的信号。我们成功夺取了码头。

languages.text: Les infiltrators ont tué les officiers ennemis les uns après les autres, semant la panique et la confusion dans leurs rangs. Chaque cadavre était ensuite soigneusement empalé sur un pic, de façon à ce que les hérétiques puissent voir leurs commandants de loin. Une fois le chaos à son paroxysme, les Space Wolves ont détruit les tourelles, ouvert les portes et donné le signal que nous attendions pour attaquer. Le quai était à nous.
languages.original_text: The infiltrators killed one officer after another, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their commanders from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

traits.locale_text: Les infiltrators ont tué les officiers ennemis les uns après les autres, semant la panique et la confusion dans leurs rangs. Chaque cadavre était ensuite soigneusement empalé sur un pic, de façon à ce que les hérétiques puissent voir leurs commandants de loin. Une fois le chaos à son paroxysme, les Space Wolves ont détruit les tourelles, ouvert les portes et donné le signal que nous attendions pour attaquer. Le quai était à nous.

languages.text: 浸透者は次々と士官を殺害し、敵の間にパニックと混乱をまき散らした。異端者たちが遠くから司令官を見ることができるように死体は杭に刺された。騒乱がピークに達すると、スペースウルフたちはタレットを破壊し、ゲートを開け、攻撃の合図を出した。我々はドックを制圧した。
languages.original_text: The infiltrators killed one officer after another, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their commanders from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

traits.locale_text: 浸透者は次々と士官を殺害し、敵の間にパニックと混乱をまき散らした。異端者たちが遠くから司令官を見ることができるように死体は杭に刺された。騒乱がピークに達すると、スペースウルフたちはタレットを破壊し、ゲートを開け、攻撃の合図を出した。我々はドックを制圧した。

languages.text: Los infiltradores abatieron a un oficial tras otro, sembrando el pánico y el descontrol entre los enemigos. Empalaron a sus presas para que los herejes pudieran ver a sus comandantes desde lejos. Cuando el desorden alcanzó su apogeo, los Lobos Espaciales destruyeron las torretas, abrieron las puertas y dieron la orden de atacar. El puerto era nuestro.
languages.original_text: The infiltrators killed one officer after another, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their commanders from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

traits.locale_text: Los infiltradores abatieron a un oficial tras otro, sembrando el pánico y el descontrol entre los enemigos. Empalaron a sus presas para que los herejes pudieran ver a sus comandantes desde lejos. Cuando el desorden alcanzó su apogeo, los Lobos Espaciales destruyeron las torretas, abrieron las puertas y dieron la orden de atacar. El puerto era nuestro.

languages.text: Die Infiltratoren töteten einen Offizier nach dem anderen, säten in den Reihen des Feindes Panik und Unordnung. Die Leichen wurden auf Pfähle gespießt, damit die Ketzer ihre Kommandanten aus der Ferne sehen konnten. Als das Chaos seinen Höhepunkt erreichte, zerstörten die Space Wolves die Geschütze, öffneten die Tore und gaben das Signal zum Angriff. Das Dock gehörte uns.
languages.original_text: The infiltrators killed one officer after another, sowing panic and disarray among the enemy. The bodies were impaled on spikes so that the heretics could see their commanders from afar. Once the mayhem had reached its peak, the Space Wolves demolished the turrets, opened the gates, and gave the signal to attack. The dock was ours.

traits.locale_text: Die Infiltratoren töteten einen Offizier nach dem anderen, säten in den Reihen des Feindes Panik und Unordnung. Die Leichen wurden auf Pfähle gespießt, damit die Ketzer ihre Kommandanten aus der Ferne sehen konnten. Als das Chaos seinen Höhepunkt erreichte, zerstörten die Space Wolves die Geschütze, öffneten die Tore und gaben das Signal zum Angriff. Das Dock gehörte uns.
